# Tote

> A cart that doesn't belong to a store.

Tote is a free cross-store shopping organizer. It saves products from any online store in one place so you can organize, compare, and track them across every retailer.

## Key Features

- **One-click saving**: Chrome extension saves any product page instantly
- **Collections**: Organize saved products into folders by project, season, or theme
- **Slots**: Subdivide collections into categories (e.g., "Seating", "Lighting")
- **Selections & budgets**: Mark favorites, set selection limits, track spending
- **Price refresh**: Update saved product prices on demand
- **Sharing**: Share collections via invite links or make them publicly viewable
- **Privacy-first**: No tracking, no ads, no data selling. Local-first architecture.
- **Offline support**: Works without network, syncs when reconnected
